alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 12:11PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. A period of rain and freezing rain is expected late this evening, particularly through the Mission Valley. Black ice formation is a concern due to cold ground temperatures. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially secondary roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
